attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government intends to distribute £8 billion per year in aid to the less developed countries of the world.

This is twice the amount that may be denied to our Navy to build the warships that will provide our defence for the next fifty years.

We believe that since nations such as Nigeria and Zimbabwe have become independent they have also become sovereign over looking after their own citizens and that we should not be obliged by non-accountable organizations such as the UN and the EU to provide aid to them in perpetuity.
